text:
@MattHancock @BorisJohnson An important message for the PM.
Thousands of NHS Doctors and Nurses have no WHO approved protection, are untested, no ventilators.

They risk their lives to beat Covid19 in spite of your Government, and doubtless will pay a much heavier cost in doing so.

#ToryLiesCostLives
